bibl.title: Territory of Washington v. Walker et al. Subpoena
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

org.orgName: United States District Court For The Western District of Washington Northern Division

div1.p: Territory of Washington, County of Pierce } BS.
To the Sheriff or any Constable of said County:

To Mrs. Whitten In the name of the United States you are hereby requested to appear before the undersigned, one of the Justices of the Peace in and for said county, on the 21st day of July A.D. 1885 at forthwith o'clock in the .... noon at his office, Court House in Tacoma, Pierce County, W.T. to give evidence in a certain cause, then and there to be tried, between The Territory of Washington ....Plaintiff,.. and Ma Walker Charles Walker & Helen Walker... Defendant S. on the part of Plaintiff..... Given under my hand this 21st day of July A.D. 1885...
Territory of Washington, County of Pierce } BS.
To the Sheriff or any Constable of said County:

To E.H. Sherman........ In the name of the United States you are hereby requested commanded to appear before the undersigned, on the Justices of the Peace in and for said county, on the 21st day of July A.D. 1885 at 10 o'clock in the fornoon, at his office, in Tacoma, Pierce County, W.T. to give evidence in a certain cause, then and there to be tried, between The Territory of Washington Plaintiff.., and Ma Walker Char Walker, & Helen Walker Defendants, on the part of the Plaintiff.....
Given under my hand this 21st day of July A.D. 1885
A. Campbell Justice of the Peace
